title: JavaOne starts
body:
The first event for me was the Alumni Fireside Chat which was four of us (me, Rob Gingell, Tim Lindholm and Graham Hamilton) doing open mic Q&A. Folks in the audience spent and hour and a half asking us whatever they wanted to. There were lots of good questions, some technical, some business, some tough, ... but all interesting.

Then I headed off to Thirsty Bear with some old friends from Canada to pound back some beers :-)
